txt.en: Defeat enemy guards at Shrak Mauruk ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Melethon is at the Causeway Forts.\n\nYou should speak to Melethon.

'Orcs and other foul creatures have repurposed one of the old Eastern courtyards into a stronghold they call, Shrak Mauruk. Their numbers are great there. I want to send you in to defeat some of their guards so that we may capture their stronghold.\n\n'I recommend not taking on this mission alone. There are many other able and willing warriors ready to fight. May hope be by your side.'
Melethon has ordered you to defeat enemy guards at Shrak Mauruk in hopes of capturing their stronghold.
'You have done much for the Gondorian army. Victory will surely be ours!'
Shrak Mauruk is located on the Eastern side of Osgiliath.\n\nYou should defeat enemy guards within Shrak Mauruk.
